trans-unit.source: The chef-client can be installed on machines running Microsoft Windows in the following ways:
trans-unit.target: 厨师客户端可以通过以下方式安装在运行Microsoft Windows的机器上。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client can be installed using an unattended bootstrap. This allows the chef-client to be installed from itself, without using SSH. For example, machines are often created using environments like AWS Auto Scaling, AWS CloudFormation, Rackspace Auto Scale, and PXE. In this scenario, using tooling for attended, single-machine installs like knife bootstrap or knife CLOUD_PLUGIN create is not practical because the machines are created automatically and someone cannot always be on-hand to initiate the bootstrap process.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用无人值守的引导程序来安装Chef-client。这允许在不使用SSH的情况下从其自身安装Chef-client。例如，通常使用诸如AWS Auto Scaling，AWS CloudFormation，Rackspace Auto Scale和PXE之类的环境来创建计算机。在这种情况下，使用工具进行有人参与的单机安装（例如， knife bootstrap 或 knife CLOUD_PLUGIN create 是不切实际的，因为这些机器是自动创建的，并且总不能有人亲自启动引导过程。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client can be run as a daemon. Use the chef-client cookbook to configure the chef-client as a daemon. Add the default recipe to a node’s run-list, and then use attributes in that cookbook to configure the behavior of the chef-client. For more information about these configuration options, see the chef-client cookbook repository on github.
trans-unit.target: Chef-client可以作为守护程序运行。使用chef-client cookbook 将chef-client配置为守护程序。将 default 配方添加到节点的运行列表，然后使用该食谱中的属性来配置Chef-Client的行为。有关这些配置选项的更多信息，请参见github上的chef-client cookbook存储库。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client can be run as a scheduled task. On the Microsoft Windows platform, a scheduled task provides more visibility, configurability, and reliability around log rotation and permissions, as compared to running the chef-client as a service. A scheduled task:
trans-unit.target: 厨师客户端可以作为一个计划任务来运行。在Microsoft Windows平台上,与作为服务运行chef-client相比,计划任务提供了更多关于日志轮换和权限的可视性、可配置性和可靠性。一个预定任务。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client can be used to manage node data using the command line and JSON files. Each JSON file contains a hash, the elements of which are added as node attributes. In addition, the run_list setting allows roles and/or recipes to be added to the node.
trans-unit.target: Chef-client可用于使用命令行和JSON文件管理节点数据。每个JSON文件包含一个哈希，哈希的元素作为节点属性添加。另外， run_list 设置允许将角色和/或配方添加到节点。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client configures the system based on the information that has been collected. Each resource is executed in the order identified by the run-list, and then by the order in which each resource is listed in each recipe. Each resource in the resource collection is mapped to a provider. The provider examines the node, and then does the steps necessary to complete the action. And then the next resource is processed. Each action configures a specific part of the system. This process is also referred to as convergence. This is also referred to as the “execution phase”.
trans-unit.target: 厨师客户根据已收集的信息配置系统。每个资源都按照运行列表标识的顺序执行，然后按照每个配方中每个资源的列出顺序执行。资源集合中的每个资源都映射到提供程序。提供程序检查该节点，然后执行完成操作所需的步骤。然后处理下一个资源。每个操作都会配置系统的特定部分。此过程也称为收敛。这也称为“执行阶段”。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client created its private key successfully.
trans-unit.target: 厨师客户端成功创建了自己的私钥。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client encountered an error and was unable to load node data from the Chef server.
trans-unit.target: chef客户端遇到一个错误,无法从Chef服务器加载节点数据。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client encountered an error and was unable to register with the Chef server.
trans-unit.target: 厨师客户端遇到一个错误,无法在厨师服务器上注册。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client evaluates attributes in the order defined by the run-list, including any attributes that are in the run-list because of cookbook dependencies.
trans-unit.target: chef-client按照run-list定义的顺序来评估属性,包括任何因为食谱依赖性而出现在run-list中的属性。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client executable can be run as a daemon.
trans-unit.target: 厨师客户端的可执行文件可以作为守护进程运行。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client executable is run as a command-line tool.
trans-unit.target: chef-client可执行文件是作为命令行工具运行的。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client expands the run-list from the rebuilt node object, compiling a full and complete list of roles and recipes that will be applied to the node, placing the roles and recipes in the same exact order they will be applied. (The run-list is stored in each node object’s JSON file, grouped under run_list.)
trans-unit.target: Chef客户端从重建的节点对象扩展运行列表，编译将应用于该节点的角色和配方的完整列表，并将角色和配方以与应用相同的顺序放置。 （运行列表存储在每个节点对象的JSON文件中，并在 run_list 下分组。）

trans-unit.source: The chef-client failed to expand the run-list.
trans-unit.target: 厨师客户端未能扩展运行列表。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client failed to pull down the cookbook collection from the Chef server.
trans-unit.target: 厨师客户端未能从Chef服务器上提取烹饪书集。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client gets process configuration data from the client.rb file on the node, and then gets node configuration data from Ohai. One important piece of configuration data is the name of the node, which is found in the node_name attribute in the client.rb file or is provided by Ohai. If Ohai provides the name of a node, it is typically the FQDN for the node, which is always unique within an organization.
trans-unit.target: Chef-client从节点上的client.rb文件获取流程配置数据，然后从Ohai获取节点配置数据。一项重要的配置数据是节点的名称，该名称可以在client.rb文件的 node_name 属性中找到或由Ohai提供。如果Ohai提供节点的名称，则通常是该节点的FQDN，在组织内始终是唯一的。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client has the same system requirements on the AIX platform as any other platform, with the following notes:
trans-unit.target: 厨师客户端在AIX平台上的系统要求与其他平台相同,但有以下说明。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client identifies each resource in the node object and builds the resource collection. Libraries are loaded first to ensure that all language extensions and Ruby classes are available to all resources. Next, attributes are loaded, followed by lightweight resources, and then all definitions (to ensure that any pseudo-resources within definitions are available). Finally, all recipes are loaded in the order specified by the expanded run-list. This is also referred to as the “compile phase”.
trans-unit.target: 厨师客户端标识节点对象中的每个资源并构建资源集合。首先加载库，以确保所有资源都可以使用所有语言扩展和Ruby类。接下来，先加载属性，再加载轻量级资源，然后加载所有定义（以确保定义中的任何伪资源均可用）。最后，所有配方均按扩展运行清单指定的顺序加载。这也称为“编译阶段”。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client includes a stable version of Ruby as part of the omnibus installer. The path to this version of Ruby must be added to the $PATH environment variable and saved in the configuration file for the command shell (Bash, csh, and so on) that is used on the workstation. In a command window, type the following:

trans-unit.target: 厨师客户端包括两个管理SSL证书的刀具命令。

trans-unit.target: 厨师客户端正在加载属性文件。

trans-unit.target: 厨师客户端正在加载自定义资源。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client may be run in audit-mode. Use audit-mode to evaluate custom rules—also referred to as audits—that are defined in recipes. audit-mode may be run in the following ways:
trans-unit.target: 厨师客户端可以以审核模式运行。使用审核模式评估配方中定义的自定义规则（也称为审核）。审核模式可以通过以下方式运行：

trans-unit.source: The chef-client may need to be run with elevated privileges in order to get a recipe to converge correctly. On UNIX and UNIX-like operating systems this can be done by running the command as root. On Microsoft Windows this can be done by running the command prompt as an administrator.
trans-unit.target: chef-client可能需要以高权限运行,以获得正确的配方。在UNIX和类似UNIX的操作系统上,这可以通过以root身份运行命令来实现。在Microsoft Windows上,可以以管理员身份在命令提示符下运行。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client may now be used to configure nodes that are running on the AIX platform, versions 6.1 (TL6 or higher, recommended) and 7.1 (TL0 SP3 or higher, recommended). The service resource supports starting, stopping, and restarting services that are managed by System Resource Controller (SRC), as well as managing all service states with BSD-based init systems.
trans-unit.target: 现在，chef-client可以用于配置在AIX平台6.1版（建议使用TL6或更高版本）和7.1版（建议使用TL0 SP3或更高版本）上运行的节点。该服务资源支持启动，停止和重新启动由系统资源控制器（SRC），以及管理所有的服务状态与基于BSD的init系统管理服务。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client mode in which the Data Collector will be enabled. Possible values: :solo, :client, or :both. The :solo value is used for Chef operating in Chef Solo Mode or Chef Solo Legacy Mode. Default value: both.
trans-unit.target: 启用数据收集器的Chef-Client模式。可能的值：： :solo ， :client 或 :both 。的 :solo 值用于在厨师独奏模式或厨师独奏传统模式操作厨师。默认值： both 。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client must be run as a service for it to be able to regularly check in with the Chef server. Select the Chef Client Service option to have the MSI configure the chef-client as a service.
trans-unit.target: Chef-client必须作为服务运行，以便能够定期通过Chef服务器签入。选择Chef Client Service选项，以使MSI将Chef-Client配置为服务。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client processes recipes in two phases:
trans-unit.target: 厨师客户端处理食谱分为两个阶段。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client pulls down the node object from the Chef server. If this is the first chef-client run for the node, there will not be a node object to pull down from the Chef server. After the node object is pulled down from the Chef server, the chef-client rebuilds the node object. If this is the first chef-client run for the node, the rebuilt node object will contain only the default run-list. For any subsequent chef-client run, the rebuilt node object will also contain the run-list from the previous chef-client run.
trans-unit.target: chef客戶端從Chef伺服器拉下節點物件。如果這是第一次為節點執行 chef-client,將不會有節點物件從 Chef 伺服器拉下。从Chef服务器拉下节点对象后,chef客户端重建节点对象。如果这是第一次 chef 客户端运行该节点,重建的节点对象将只包含默认的运行列表。對於任何後續的 chef-client 運行,重建的節點物件也會包含前一個 chef-client 運行的 run-list。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client pushes the node object to the Chef server at the end of the chef-client run; the updated node object on the Chef server is then indexed for search and is stored until the next chef-client run
trans-unit.target: 在厨师客户端运行结束时,厨师客户端会将节点对象推送到Chef服务器上;然后,Chef服务器上更新的节点对象会被索引以用于搜索,并被存储到下一次厨师客户端运行时。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client ran the first resource before the breakpoint (file[/tmp/before-breakpoint]), but then stopped after execution. The chef-client attempted to name the breakpoint after its position in the source file, but the chef-client was confused because the resource was entered interactively. From here, chef-shell can resume the chef-client run:
trans-unit.target: Chef客户端在断点（ file[/tmp/before-breakpoint] ）之前运行了第一个资源，但是在执行后就停止了。Chef客户端尝试以断点在源文件中的位置命名，但是由于资源是交互式输入的，chef客户端感到困惑。从这里，chef-shell可以恢复chef-client运行：

trans-unit.source: The chef-client removed a file from a cookbook.
trans-unit.target: 厨师客户从菜谱中删除了一个文件。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client run audit phase has failed.
trans-unit.target: 厨师客户端运行审核阶段失败。

trans-unit.target: 厨师-客户端运行审核阶段已经开始。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client run audit phase is finished.
trans-unit.target: 厨师-客户端运行审核阶段结束。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client run can also be rewound, and then stepped through.
trans-unit.target: 厨师客户端的运行也可以进行回放,然后进行踩点。

trans-unit.target: 厨师-客户端运行收敛阶段失败。

trans-unit.target: 厨师与客户端运行融合阶段已经开始。

trans-unit.target: 厨师-客户端运行收敛阶段完成。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client run has completed.
trans-unit.target: 厨师客户端运行已经完成。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client run has failed.
trans-unit.target: 厨师客户端运行失败。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client run has started.
trans-unit.target: 厨师客户端运行已经开始。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client run proceeds, using HTTPS (port 443), and registers the node with the Chef server.
trans-unit.target: chef客户端使用HTTPS(443端口)继续运行,并将节点注册到Chef服务器。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client successfully loaded node data from the Chef server. Default and override attributes for roles have been computed, but are not yet applied.
trans-unit.target: chef客户端成功从Chef服务器加载节点数据。角色的默认属性和覆盖属性已经计算出来,但还没有应用。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client successfully loaded the named attribute file.
trans-unit.target: 厨师客户端成功加载命名的属性文件。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client successfully loaded the named custom resource.
trans-unit.target: 厨师客户端成功加载命名的自定义资源。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client successfully loaded the named definition.
trans-unit.target: 厨师客户端成功加载了命名的定义。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client successfully loaded the named library file.
trans-unit.target: 厨师客户端成功加载命名的库文件。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client successfully loaded the named recipe.
trans-unit.target: 厨师客户端成功加载了命名的菜谱。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client successfully pulled down the cookbook collection from the Chef server.
trans-unit.target: 厨师客户端成功地从Chef服务器上调取了烹饪书集。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client supports reading multiple configuration files by putting them inside a .d configuration directory. For example: /etc/chef/client.d. All files that end in .rb in the .d directory are loaded; other non-.rb files are ignored.
trans-unit.target: Chef客户端通过将多个配置文件放在 .d 配置目录中来支持读取它们。例如： /etc/chef/client.d 。所有文件，在年底 .rb 在 .d 目录加载; 其他非 .rb 文件将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client updated the named file in the named cookbook.
trans-unit.target: 厨师客户端更新了命名菜谱中的命名文件。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client uses Erubis for templates, which is a fast, secure, and extensible implementation of embedded Ruby. Erubis should be familiar to members of the Ruby on Rails, Merb, or Puppet communities. For more information about Erubis, see: http://www.kuwata-lab.com/erubis/.
trans-unit.target: 厨师客户端将Erubis用于模板，这是嵌入式Ruby的快速，安全和可扩展的实现。Ruby on Rails，Merb或Puppet社区的成员应该熟悉Erubis。有关Erubis的更多信息，请参见：http ://www.kuwata-lab.com/erubis/ 。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client uses Ruby as its reference language for creating cookbooks and defining recipes, with an extended DSL for specific resources. A reasonable set of resources are available to the chef-client, enough to support many of the most common infrastructure automation scenarios; however, this DSL can also be extended when additional resources and capabilities are required.
trans-unit.target: 厨师客户端使用Ruby作为参考语言来创建食谱和定义食谱,并为特定资源提供扩展的DSL。一套合理的资源可供厨师客户端使用,足以支持许多最常见的基础设施自动化场景;然而,当需要额外的资源和能力时,这个DSL也可以扩展。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client uses Ruby as its reference language for creating cookbooks and defining recipes, with an extended DSL for specific resources. The chef-client provides a reasonable set of resources, enough to support many of the most common infrastructure automation scenarios; however, this DSL can also be extended when additional resources and capabilities are required.
trans-unit.target: chef-client使用Ruby作为创建食谱和定义食谱的参考语言,并为特定资源提供了扩展的DSL。chef-client提供了一套合理的资源,足以支持许多最常见的基础设施自动化场景;然而,当需要额外的资源和功能时,这个DSL也可以扩展。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client uses a cache file to keep track of the order in which each revision of an application is deployed. By default, the cache file is located at /var/chef/cache/revision-deploys/APPNAME/. To force a re-deploy, delete the deployment directory or delete the cache file.
trans-unit.target: Chef客户端使用缓存文件来跟踪应用程序每个修订版本的部署顺序。默认情况下，缓存文件位于 /var/chef/cache/revision-deploys/APPNAME/ 。要强制重新部署，请删除部署目录或删除缓存文件。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client uses a lock file to ensure that only one chef-client run is in progress at any time. A lock file is created at the start of the chef-client run and is deleted at the end of the chef-client run. A new chef-client run looks for the presence of a lock file and, if present, will wait for that lock file to be deleted. The location of the lock file can vary by platform.
trans-unit.target: chef-client使用一个锁文件来确保任何时候只有一个chef-client运行在进行中。锁定文件在厨师客户端运行开始时创建,在厨师客户端运行结束时删除。新的 chef-client 运行会寻找锁文件的存在,如果存在,会等待锁文件被删除。锁定文件的位置会因平台而异。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client uses six types of attributes to determine the value that is applied to a node during the chef-client run. In addition, the chef-client sources attribute values from up to five locations. The combination of attribute types and sources allows for up to 15 different competing values to be available to the chef-client during the chef-client run:
trans-unit.target: chef-client使用六种类型的属性来决定在chef-client运行期间应用到节点的值。此外,chef-client还从最多五个地方获取属性值。属性类型和来源的组合允许厨师客户端在运行厨师客户端时有多达15种不同的竞争值。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client uses the EN_US (UTF-8) character set. By default, the AIX base operating system does not include the EN_US (UTF-8) character set and it must be installed prior to installing the chef-client. The EN_US (UTF-8) character set may be installed from the first disc in the AIX media or may be copied from /installp/ppc/*EN_US* to a location on the logical partition (LPAR). This topic assumes this location to be /tmp/rte.
trans-unit.target: 厨师客户端使用EN_US（UTF-8）字符集。缺省情况下，AIX基本操作系统不包括EN_US（UTF-8）字符集，并且必须在安装Chef-client之前安装它。 EN_US（UTF-8）字符集可以从AIX介质中的第一张光盘安装，也可以从 /installp/ppc/*EN_US* 复制到逻辑分区（LPAR）上的某个位置。本主题假定此位置为 /tmp/rte 。

This feature installs a Windows PowerShell module (typically in C:\opscode\chef\modules) that is also appended to the PSModulePath environment variable. This feature is not enabled by default. To activate this feature, run the following command from within Windows PowerShell:

trans-unit.source: The chef-client will determine the correct provider based on configuration data collected by Ohai at the start of the chef-client run. This configuration data is then mapped to a platform and an associated list of providers.

trans-unit.source: The chef-client will look up the provider for the directory resource, which happens to be Chef::Provider::Directory, call load_current_resource to create a directory["/tmp/folder"] resource, and then, based on the current state of the directory, do the specified action, which in this case is to create a directory called /tmp/folder. If the directory already exists, nothing will happen. If the directory was changed in any way, the resource is marked as updated.
trans-unit.target: Chef客户端将查找 directory 资源的提供者，该提供者恰好是 Chef::Provider::Directory ，调用 load_current_resource 创建一个 directory["/tmp/folder"] 资源，然后基于当前状态目录，请执行指定的操作，在这种情况下，将创建一个名为 /tmp/folder 的目录。如果目录已经存在，则不会发生任何事情。如果目录以任何方式更改，则该资源将标记为已更新。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client will only update the property values that require updates and will not make changes when the property values are already in the desired state
trans-unit.target: 厨师客户端只会更新需要更新的属性值,当属性值已经处于所需的状态时,不会进行更改。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client will pick up the _default run-list if env_run_list[environment_name] is null or nonexistent.
trans-unit.target: 如果 env_run_list[environment_name] 为null或不存在，则厨师客户将选择 _default 运行列表。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client will pull down the node object from the Chef server (which contains the attribute data from the previous chef-client run), after which all attributes (except normal are reset)
trans-unit.target: Chef-Client将从Chef服务器中拉出节点对象（该节点对象包含来自先前Chef-Client运行的属性数据），然后所有属性（ normal 除外）将重置

trans-unit.source: The chef-client will rebuild the attribute list and apply attribute precedence while configuring the node
trans-unit.target: chef-client将重建属性列表,并在配置节点的同时应用属性优先。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client will run a recipe only when asked. When the chef-client runs the same recipe more than once, the results will be the same system state each time. When a recipe is run against a system, but nothing has changed on either the system or in the recipe, the chef-client won’t change anything.
trans-unit.target: 厨师客户仅在询问时才会运行食谱。当厨师客户多次运行相同的配方时，每次的结果将是相同的系统状态。当配方在系统上运行时，但在系统或配方中均未更改时，厨师客户将不会更改任何内容。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client will update the cookbooks on the node (if required), which updates the attributes contained in attribute files and recipes
trans-unit.target: 厨师客户端将更新节点上的食谱(如果需要),从而更新属性文件和食谱中包含的属性。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client will update the role and environment data (if required)
trans-unit.target: 厨师客户端将更新角色和环境数据(如果需要)。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client, by default, will attempt to execute a Homebrew command as the owner of /usr/local/bin/brew. If that executable does not exist, the chef-client will attempt to find the user by executing which brew. If that executable cannot be found, the chef-client will print an error message: Could not find the "brew" executable in /usr/local/bin or anywhere on the path.. Use the homebrew_user attribute to specify the Homebrew owner for situations where the chef-client cannot automatically detect the correct owner.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，chef-client将尝试以 /usr/local/bin/brew 的所有者身份执行Homebrew命令。如果该可执行文件不存在，则厨师客户端将尝试通过执行 which brew 来查找用户。如果找不到该可执行文件，则厨师客户端将显示一条错误消息： Could not find the "brew" executable in /usr/local/bin or anywhere on the path. 。如果厨师客户端无法自动检测到正确的所有者，请使用 homebrew_user 属性指定“家庭酿造”所有者。

trans-unit.target: chef-repo应该与版本控制系统(如git)同步,然后像管理源代码一样管理它

trans-unit.source: The chef-server.rb file contains all of the non-default configuration settings used by the Chef server. (The default settings are built-in to the Chef server configuration and should only be added to the chef-server.rb file to apply non-default values.) These configuration settings are processed when the chef-server-ctl reconfigure command is run, such as immediately after setting up the Chef server or after making a change to the underlying configuration settings after the server has been deployed. The chef-server.rb file is a Ruby file, which means that conditional statements can be used in the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Chef-server.rb文件包含Chef服务器使用的所有非默认配置设置。 （默认设置内置于Chef服务器配置中，应仅将其添加到chef-server.rb文件中以应用非默认值。）运行 chef-server-ctl reconfigure 命令时将处理这些配置设置。，例如在设置Chef服务器之后或在部署服务器后对基础配置设置进行更改之后。 Chef-server.rb文件是一个Ruby文件，这意味着可以在配置文件中使用条件语句。

trans-unit.source: The chef-server.rb file contains settings that can be used to edit the number of nodes that are under license:
trans-unit.target: chef-server.rb文件包含了一些设置,可以用来编辑许可证下的节点数量。

trans-unit.source: The chef-server.rb file does not exist by default. To modify the settings for the Chef server, create a file named chef-server.rb in the /etc/opscode/ directory.

trans-unit.source: The chefignore file is used to tell knife which cookbook files in the chef-repo should be ignored when uploading data to the Chef server. The type of data that should be ignored includes swap files, version control data, build output data, and so on. The chefignore file uses the File.fnmatch Ruby syntax to define the ignore patterns using *, **, and ? wildcards.

trans-unit.source: The default configuration of the chef-client assumes that it is run as the root user. This affords the chef-client the greatest flexibility when managing the state of any object. However, the chef-client may be run as a non-root user—i.e. “run as a user with limited system privileges”—which can be useful when the objects on the system are available to other user accounts.
trans-unit.target: Chef客户端的默认配置假定它以root用户身份运行。这在管理任何对象的状态时为厨师客户提供了最大的灵活性。但是，chef-client可以以非root用户身份运行（即“以具有有限系统特权的用户身份运行”），当系统上的对象可供其他用户帐户使用时，这很有用。

trans-unit.source: The default value for opscode_solr4['heap_size'] should work for many organizations, especially those with fewer than 25 nodes. For organizations with more than 25 nodes, set this value to 25% of system memory or 1024, whichever is smaller. For very large configurations, increase this value to 25% of system memory or 4096, whichever is smaller. This value should not exceed 8192.
trans-unit.target: opscode_solr4['heap_size'] 的默认值应适用于许多组织，尤其是节点少于25个的组织。对于节点数超过25的组织，请将此值设置为系统内存的25％或 1024 ，以较小者为准。对于非常大的配置，请将此值增加到系统内存的25％或 4096 （以较小者为准）。该值不应超过 8192 。

trans-unit.source: The desired approach just depends on the desired workflow. For example, if a node requires a new file every day, using the checksum approach would require that the local checksum be updated and/or verified every day as well, in order to ensure that the local checksum was the correct one. Using a conditional GET in this scenario will greatly simplify the management required to ensure files are being updated accurately.
trans-unit.target: 所需的方法仅取决于所需的工作流程。例如，如果节点每天需要一个新文件，则使用校验和方法将要求每天也更新和/或验证本地校验和，以确保本地校验和是正确的。在这种情况下使用条件 GET 将大大简化确保文件被正确更新所需的管理。

trans-unit.source: The distinguished name used to bind to the LDAP server. The user the Chef server will use to perform LDAP searches. This is often the administrator or manager user. This user needs to have read access to all LDAP users that require authentication. The Chef server must do an LDAP search before any user can log in. Many Active Directory and LDAP systems do not allow an anonymous bind. If anonymous bind is allowed, leave the bind_dn and bind_password settings blank. If anonymous bind is not allowed, a user with READ access to the directory is required. This user must be specified as an LDAP distinguished name similar to:

trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，第一次厨师客户端运行包含一个空运行列表。甲运行列表可以被指定为使用初始自举操作的一部分 --run-list 选项作为一部分 knife bootstrap 子命令。

trans-unit.source: The first thing it will do is attempt to promote itself to DRBD primary, which will fail if the disk has been written to at all while this host was down, and Keepalived will be unable to transition back to the original master. This leaves the pair of servers in a good state, with the second back-end box as the DRBD primary Chef server master.
trans-unit.target: 首先它会尝试将自己升级为DRBD主控,如果在这台主机宕机的时候,磁盘根本没有被写入,那么就会失败,Keepalived将无法过渡回原来的主控。这样一来,这对服务器的状态就很好了,第二个后端盒子作为DRBD主厨服务器主控。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use only_if with one (or more) cookbook attributes to ensure that packages are only installed when necessary. In this case, three attributes exist in the /attributes/default.rb file: use_openssl, use_pcre, and use_zlib. Each of these attributes are defined as false by default. The only_if attributes are used to test for the presence of these packages on the target node before then asking the chef-client to complete the process of installing these packages. If the packages are already present, the chef-client will do nothing.
trans-unit.target: 以下示例说明如何将 only_if 与一个（或多个）食谱属性一起使用，以确保仅在必要时安装软件包。在这种情况下，/attributes/ /attributes/default.rb 文件中存在三个属性： use_openssl ， use_pcre 和 use_zlib 。这些属性中的每一个在默认情况下都定义为 false 。该 only_if 属性然后问厨师的客户端来完成这些安装包的过程之前，用于测试目标节点上的这些包的存在。如果软件包已经存在，则厨师客户将不执行任何操作。

trans-unit.source: The format in which data is sent to the Chef server. This header is required for PUT and POST requests and must be set to application/json.
trans-unit.target: 数据发送到Chef服务器的格式。对于 PUT 和 POST 请求，此标头是必需的，并且必须将其设置为 application/json 。

trans-unit.source: The format in which response data from the Chef server is provided. This header must be set to application/json.
trans-unit.target: 提供来自Chef服务器的响应数据的格式。此标头必须设置为 application/json 。

trans-unit.source: The frequency (in documents) at which node objects are added to the Apache Solr search index. Default value: 1000 (every 1000 documents).
trans-unit.target: 将节点对象添加到Apache Solr搜索索引的频率（在文档中）。默认值： 1000 （每1000个文档）。

trans-unit.source: The frequency (in documents) at which node objects are added to the Apache Solr search index. This value should be tuned carefully. When data is committed to the Apache Solr index, all incoming updates are blocked. If the duration between updates is too short, it is possible for the rate at which updates are asked to occur to be faster than the rate at which objects can be actually committed. Default value: 1000 (every 1000 documents).
trans-unit.target: 将节点对象添加到Apache Solr搜索索引的频率（在文档中）。该值应仔细调整。将数据提交到Apache Solr索引后，所有传入的更新都会被阻止。如果更新之间的持续时间太短，则要求更新发生的速度可能比实际提交对象的速度要快。默认值： 1000 （每1000个文档）。

trans-unit.source: The frequency (in milliseconds) at which the length of the RabbitMQ queue is checked. Default value: 30000.
trans-unit.target: 检查RabbitMQ队列长度的频率（以毫秒为单位）。默认值： 30000 。

trans-unit.source: The frequency (in seconds) at which a job is started.
trans-unit.target: 启动作业的频率(以秒为单位)。

trans-unit.source: The frequency (in seconds) at which jobs are allowed to spawn. Default value: 10.
trans-unit.target: 允许产生作业的频率（以秒为单位）。默认值： 10 。

trans-unit.source: The frequency (in seconds) at which messages are sent to the server log files if checkpoint segments are being filled faster than their currently configured values. Default value: 30s.
trans-unit.target: 如果检查点段的填充速度快于其当前配置的值，则将消息发送到服务器日志文件的频率（以秒为单位）。默认值： 30s 。

trans-unit.source: The frequency (in seconds) at which node objects are added to the Apache Solr search index. Default value: 60000 (every 60 seconds).
trans-unit.target: 将节点对象添加到Apache Solr搜索索引的频率（以秒为单位）。默认值： 60000 （每60秒）。

trans-unit.source: The frequency (in seconds) at which node objects are added to the Apache Solr search index. This value should be tuned carefully. When data is committed to the Apache Solr index, all incoming updates are blocked. If the duration between updates is too short, it is possible for the rate at which updates are asked to occur to be faster than the rate at which objects can be actually committed. Default value: 60000 (every 60 seconds).
trans-unit.target: 将节点对象添加到Apache Solr搜索索引的频率（以秒为单位）。该值应仔细调整。将数据提交到Apache Solr索引后，所有传入的更新都会被阻止。如果更新之间的持续时间太短，则要求更新发生的速度可能比实际提交对象的速度要快。默认值： 60000 （每60秒）。

trans-unit.source: The frequency (in seconds) at which the chef-client runs. Default value: 1800.
trans-unit.target: 厨师客户端运行的频率（以秒为单位）。默认值 1800 。

trans-unit.source: The frequency (in seconds) at which the chef-client runs. When the chef-client is run at intervals, --splay and --interval values are applied before the chef-client run. Default value: 1800.
trans-unit.target: 厨师客户端运行的频率（以秒为单位）。当厨师客户机间隔运行时，将在厨师客户机运行之前应用 --splay 和 --interval 值。默认值 1800 。

trans-unit.source: The frequency (in seconds) at which the chef-client runs. When the chef-client is run at intervals, --splay and --interval values are applied before the chef-client run. This option may not be used in the same command with the --[no-]fork option.
trans-unit.target: 厨师客户端运行的频率（以秒为单位）。当厨师客户机间隔运行时，将在厨师客户机运行之前应用 --splay 和 --interval 值。此选项可能无法与 --[no-]fork 选项一起使用。

trans-unit.source: The frequency (in seconds) at which the chef-client runs. When the chef-client is run at intervals, --splay values are applied first, then the chef-client run occurs, and then --interval values are applied.
trans-unit.target: 厨师客户端运行的频率（以秒为单位）。当Chef-Client间隔运行时，将首先应用 --splay 值，然后发生Chef-client运行，然后应用 --interval 值。

trans-unit.source: The frequency (in seconds) at which the primary VRRP server is to advertise. Default value: '1'.
trans-unit.target: 主VRRP服务器发布的频率（以秒为单位）。默认值： '1' 。

trans-unit.source: The frequency (in seconds) at which the secondary machine polls the primary. Default value: 20.
trans-unit.target: 辅助计算机轮询主计算机的频率（以秒为单位）。默认值： 20 。

trans-unit.source: The frequency at which Apt repository updates are made. Use this property when the :periodic action is specified. Default value: 86400.
trans-unit.target: Apt系统信息库更新的频率。指定 :periodic 操作时，请使用此属性。默认值： 86400 。

trans-unit.source: The frequency at which the operating system writes data on-disk, instead of waiting for more data. Possible values: no (don’t fsync, let operating system flush data), always (fsync after every write to the append-only log file), and everysec (fsync only once time per second). Default value: 'always'.
trans-unit.target: 操作系统在磁盘上写入数据的频率，而不是等待更多数据的频率。可能的值： no （不执行fsync，让操作系统刷新数据）， always （每次写入仅附加日志文件后 everysec fsync ）和everysec（每秒仅一次fsync）。默认值： 'always' 。

trans-unit.source: The frequency at which unique URLs are generated. This value may be a specific amount of time, i.e. 15m (fifteen minutes) or a percentage of the value of s3_url_ttl, i.e. 10%. Default value: :off.
trans-unit.target: 生成唯一URL的频率。该值可以是特定的时间量，即 15m （十五分钟），也可以是 s3_url_ttl 值的百分比，即 10% 。默认值 :off 。

trans-unit.source: The fsck device on the Solaris platform. Default value: -.
trans-unit.target: Solaris平台上的fsck设备。默认值： - 。

trans-unit.source: The fully qualified URL to the data collector server API.
trans-unit.target: 数据采集器服务器API的完全限定URL。

trans-unit.source: The fully qualified domain name for a node. This is used as the name of a node unless otherwise set.
trans-unit.target: 节点的完全限定域名。除非另有设置,否则将作为节点的名称。

trans-unit.source: The gateway for the route.
trans-unit.target: 航线的网关。

trans-unit.source: The group name or group ID that must be changed before running a command.
trans-unit.target: 运行命令前必须更改的组名或组ID。

trans-unit.source: The group name under which services will run.
trans-unit.target: 服务将在其下运行的组名。

trans-unit.source: The group that owns a process. This is required when starting any executable as a daemon. Default value: nil.
trans-unit.target: 拥有流程的组。当将任何可执行文件作为守护程序启动时，这是必需的。默认值： nil 。

trans-unit.source: The handler processing phase of the chef-client run has started.
trans-unit.target: 厨师客户端运行的处理程序处理阶段已经开始。

trans-unit.source: The handler processing phase of the chef-client run is complete.
trans-unit.target: 厨师客户端运行的处理程序处理阶段已经完成。

trans-unit.source: The hardware address for the network interface.
trans-unit.target: 网络接口的硬件地址。

trans-unit.source: The hash of the contents of this request.
trans-unit.target: 本次请求内容的哈希值。

trans-unit.source: The home directory for PostgreSQL. Default value: /var/opt/opscode/postgresql.
trans-unit.target: PostgreSQL的主目录。默认值： /var/opt/opscode/postgresql 。

trans-unit.source: The home directory for the user under which Chef server services run. Default value: /opt/opscode/embedded.
trans-unit.target: 运行Chef服务器服务的用户的主目录。默认值： /opt/opscode/embedded 。

trans-unit.source: The host name (and port number) to which a request is sent. (Port number 80 does not need to be specified.) For example: api.opscode.com (which is the same as api.opscode.com:80) or api.opscode.com:443.
trans-unit.target: 向其发送请求的主机名（和端口号）。（不需要指定端口号 80 。）例如： api.opscode.com （与 api.opscode.com:80 相同）或 api.opscode.com:443 。

trans-unit.source: The host name for the node.
trans-unit.target: 节点的主机名称。

trans-unit.source: The host on which Redis runs. Default value: localhost.
trans-unit.target: Redis运行所在的主机。默认值： localhost 。

trans-unit.source: The host on which chef-zero is started.
trans-unit.target: 启动chef-zero的主机。

trans-unit.source: The host on which the Nginx stub_status module listens. Default value: "127.0.0.1".
trans-unit.target: Nginx stub_status 模块监听的主机。默认值： "127.0.0.1" 。

trans-unit.source: The hostname for the Chef Analytics server may be specified using a FQDN or an IP address. This hostname must be resolvable. For example, a Chef Analytics server that is running in a production environment with a resolvable FQDN hostname can be added in the DNS system. But when deploying Chef Analytics into a testing environment, adding the hostname to the /etc/hosts file is enough to ensure that hostname is resolvable.
trans-unit.target: Chef Analytics服务器的主机名可以使用FQDN或IP地址指定。该主机名必须是可解析的。例如，可以在DNS系统中添加运行在具有可解析FQDN主机名的生产环境中的Chef Analytics服务器。但是，当将Chef Analytics部署到测试环境中时，将主机名添加到 /etc/hosts 文件中足以确保主机名是可解析的。

trans-unit.source: The hostname for the Chef server may be specified using a FQDN or an IP address. This hostname must be resolvable. For example, a Chef server running in a production environment with a resolvable FQDN hostname can be added the DNS system. But when deploying Chef server into a testing environment, adding the hostname to the /etc/hosts file is enough to ensure that hostname is resolvable.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用FQDN或IP地址指定Chef服务器的主机名。该主机名必须是可解析的。例如，可以将在生产环境中运行且具有可解析的FQDN主机名的Chef服务器添加到DNS系统。但是，当将Chef服务器部署到测试环境中时，将主机名添加到 /etc/hosts 文件中足以确保主机名是可解析的。

trans-unit.source: The hostname for the Chef server must be an FQDN, including the domain suffix, and must be resolvable by the backend and frontend servers. See Hostnames, FQDNs for more information.
trans-unit.target: Chef服务器的主机名必须是FQDN（包括域后缀），并且后端和前端服务器必须可以解析。有关更多信息，请参见主机名，FQDN。

trans-unit.source: The hostname for the Chef server must be an FQDN, including the domain suffix, and must be resolvable by the other backend and frontend servers. See Hostnames, FQDNs for more information.
trans-unit.target: Chef服务器的主机名必须是FQDN（包括域后缀），并且必须可由其他后端和前端服务器解析。有关更多信息，请参见主机名，FQDN。

trans-unit.source: The hostname to which the node is to connect. Default value: chef@localhost.
trans-unit.target: 节点要连接到的主机名。默认值： chef@localhost 。

trans-unit.source: The hour at which the cron entry is to run (0 - 23). Default value: *.
trans-unit.target: cron条目运行的小时数（0-23）。默认值： * 。

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the group.
trans-unit.target: 该组的标识符。

trans-unit.source: The identity of the consumer to which messages are published. Default value: 'hotsauce'.
trans-unit.target: 消息发布到的消费者的身份。默认值： 'hotsauce' 。

trans-unit.source: The identity of the consumer to which messages are published. Default value: default.
trans-unit.target: 消息发布到的消费者的身份。默认值： default 。

trans-unit.source: The images below refer to client keys as a “Client”.
trans-unit.target: 下图将客户端密钥称为“客户端”。

trans-unit.source: The initial worker count for the HTTP connection pool that is used by the rabbitmq-management plugin. Default value: 25.
trans-unit.target: Rabbitmq-management插件使用的HTTP连接池的初始工作程序计数。默认值： 25 。

trans-unit.source: The installation of the chef-client on management workstations
trans-unit.target: 在管理工作站上安装厨师客户端。

trans-unit.source: The installation process for the Chef server requires the use of at least two user and group identifiers (UIDs and GIDs). These are used to create the opscode and opscode-pgsql users and their default groups.
trans-unit.target: Chef服务器的安装过程要求至少使用两个用户和组标识符（UID和GID）。这些用于创建 opscode 和 opscode-pgsql 用户及其默认组。

trans-unit.source: The intended purpose of the job: Adaptive, Background, Interactive, or Standard.
trans-unit.target: 工作的预期目的： Adaptive ， Background ， Interactive 或 Standard 。

trans-unit.source: The interface over which VRRP traffic is sent. Should be set to the name of the dedicated interface for Keepalived. Default value: 'eth0'.
trans-unit.target: 发送VRRP流量的接口。应该设置为Keepalived专用接口的名称。默认值： 'eth0' 。

trans-unit.source: The key components of nodes that are under management by Chef include:
trans-unit.target: 由Chef管理的节点主要包括:。

trans-unit.source: The key file used by the privileged user. Default value: '/etc/opscode/webui_priv.pem'.
trans-unit.target: 特权用户使用的密钥文件。默认值： '/etc/opscode/webui_priv.pem' 。

trans-unit.source: The key unit of measure for scaling the Chef server is the number of chef-client runs per minute: CCRs/min. For example, 500 nodes set to check in every 30 minutes is equivalent to 16.66 CCRs/min.
trans-unit.target: 衡量Chef服务器规模的关键单位是每分钟的chef-客户端运行次数。CCRs/min。例如,500个节点设置为每30分钟检查一次,相当于16.66个CCRs/min。

trans-unit.target: knife.rb文件必须在.chef文件夹中创建。它应该看起来类似于:

trans-unit.source: The knife.rb, ORGANIZATION-validator.pem, and USER.pem files must be moved to the .chef directory after they are downloaded from the Chef server.
trans-unit.target: knife.rb、ORGANIZATION-validator.pem和USER.pem文件从Chef服务器下载后,必须移动到.chef目录。

trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，部署资源的布局与Ruby on Rails应用程序匹配，但是可以自定义。要自定义布局，请执行以下操作：

trans-unit.source: The layout of the local chef-repo. Possible values: static, everything, or hosted_everything. Use static for just roles, environments, cookbooks, and data bags. By default, everything and hosted_everything are dynamically selected depending on the server type.
trans-unit.target: 当地厨师回购的布局。可能的值： static ， everything 或 hosted_everything 。仅将 static 用于角色，环境，菜谱和数据包。默认情况下， everything 和 hosted_everything 都是根据服务器类型动态选择的。

trans-unit.source: The layout of the local chef-repo. Possible values: static, everything, or hosted_everything. Use static for just roles, environments, cookbooks, and data bags. By default, everything and hosted_everything are dynamically selected depending on the server type. Default value: default.
trans-unit.target: 当地厨师回购的布局。可能的值： static ， everything 或 hosted_everything 。仅将 static 用于角色，环境，菜谱和数据包。默认情况下， everything 和 hosted_everything 都是根据服务器类型动态选择的。默认值： default 。

trans-unit.source: The layout of the local chef-repo. Possible values: static, everything, or hosted_everything. Use static for just roles, environments, cookbooks, and data bags. By default, everything and hosted_everything are dynamically selected depending on the server type. Default: everything / hosted_everything.
trans-unit.target: 当地厨师回购的布局。可能的值： static ， everything 或 hosted_everything 。仅将 static 用于角色，环境，菜谱和数据包。默认情况下， everything 和 hosted_everything 都是根据服务器类型动态选择的。默认值： everything / hosted_everything 。

trans-unit.source: The length of this request.
trans-unit.target: 这个请求的长度。

trans-unit.source: The level of logging that is to be displayed by the chef-client. The chef-client uses the mixlib-log (https://github.com/chef/mixlib-log) to handle logging behavior. Options (in order of priority): :debug, :info, :warn, :error, and :fatal. Default value: :info.
trans-unit.target: 厨师客户端将显示的日志记录级别。 Chef客户端使用 mixlib-log （https://github.com/chef/mixlib-log）处理日志记录行为。选项（按优先级顺序）：： :debug ， :info ， :warn ， :error 和 :fatal 。默认值 :info 。

trans-unit.source: The level of logging to be stored in a log file.
trans-unit.target: 储存在日志文件中的日志级别。

trans-unit.source: The level of logging to be stored in a log file. Possible levels: :auto (default), :debug, :info, :warn, :error, or :fatal. Default value: :warn (when a terminal is available) or :info (when a terminal is not available).
trans-unit.target: 要存储在日志文件中的日志记录级别。可能的级别：： :auto （默认） :debug ， :info ， :warn ， :error 或 :fatal 。默认值：： :warn （当终端可用时）或 :info （当终端不可用时）。

trans-unit.source: The level of logging to be stored in a log file. Possible levels: :auto (default), debug, info, warn, error, or fatal.
trans-unit.target: 要存储在日志文件中的日志记录级别。可能的级别：： :auto （默认）， debug ， info ， warn ， error 或 fatal 。

trans-unit.source: The level of logging to be stored in a log file. Possible levels: :auto (default), debug, info, warn, error, or fatal. Default value: warn (when a terminal is available) or info (when a terminal is not available).
trans-unit.target: 要存储在日志文件中的日志记录级别。可能的级别：： :auto （默认）， debug ， info ， warn ， error 或 fatal 。默认值： warn （当终端可用时）或 info （当终端不可用时）。

trans-unit.source: The level of logging to be stored in a log file.. Possible values: debug, notice, verbose, and warning. Default value: 'notice'.
trans-unit.target: 要存储在日志文件中的日志记录级别。可能的值： debug ， notice ， verbose 和 warning 。默认值： 'notice' 。

trans-unit.source: The list of attributes that are required to configure a cookbook. An attribute name is required, followed by any of these options: display_name (the name that appears in the user interface), description (a short description), choice (an array of choices that are presented to a user), calculated (the default value is calculated by the recipe), type (the type of value, either string, array, or hash), required (the level of user input, either required, recommended, or optional), recipes (an array of recipes), or default (the attribute’s default value).
trans-unit.target: 配置食谱所需的属性列表。属性名称是必需的，后跟以下任何一个选项： display_name （显示在用户界面中的名称）， description （简短描述）， choice （显示给用户的选择数组），已 calculated （默认）值由配方计算得出）， type （值的类型，可以是 string ， array 或 hash ）， required （用户输入的级别，可以是 required ， recommended 或 optional ）， recipes （一组食谱）或 default （该属性的默认值）。

trans-unit.source: The location from which a data bag is loaded. Default value: /var/chef/data_bags.
trans-unit.target: 数据袋的加载位置。默认值： /var/chef/data_bags 。

trans-unit.source: The location in which a process identification number (pid) is saved. An executable, when started as a daemon, writes the pid to the specified file. Default value: /tmp/name-of-executable.pid.
trans-unit.target: 进程标识号（pid）的存储位置。可执行文件作为守护程序启动时，会将pid写入指定的文件。默认值： /tmp/name-of-executable.pid 。

trans-unit.source: The location in which backup files are stored. If this value is empty, backup files are stored in the directory of the target file. Default value: /var/chef/backup.
trans-unit.target: 备份文件的存储位置。如果该值为空，则备份文件存储在目标文件的目录中。默认值： /var/chef/backup 。

trans-unit.source: The location in which checksum files are stored. These are used to validate individual cookbook files, such as recipes. The checksum itself is stored in the Chef server database and is then compared to a file in the checksum path that has a filename identical to the checksum.
trans-unit.target: 存储校验和文件的位置。这些文件用于验证单个食谱文件,如食谱。校验和本身存储在Chef服务器数据库中,然后与校验和路径中的一个文件进行比较,该文件的文件名与校验和相同。

trans-unit.source: The location in which cookbook files are stored (temporarily) during upload.
trans-unit.target: 上传过程中,cookbook文件的存储位置(暂时)。

trans-unit.source: The location in which cookbooks (and other transient data) files are stored when they are synchronized. This value can also be used in recipes to download files with the remote_file resource.
trans-unit.target: 同步食谱（和其他暂态数据）文件的存储位置。也可以在配方中使用该值来下载带有remote_file资源的文件。

trans-unit.source: The location in which nodes are stored when the chef-client is run in local mode. Default value: /var/chef/node.
trans-unit.target: 当chef-client在本地模式下运行时，节点的存储位置。默认值： /var/chef/node 。

trans-unit.source: The location in which role files are located. Default value: /var/chef/roles.

See “File Specificity” below for more information. Default value: the name of the resource block See “Syntax” section above for more information.
trans-unit.target: 模板文件的位置。默认情况下，chef-client在食谱的 /templates 目录中查找模板文件。当 local 属性设置为 true 时，可用于在本地节点上指定模板的路径。此属性还可以用于将特定文件分发到特定平台。有关更多信息，请参见下面的“文件特异性”。默认值：资源块的 name 。有关更多信息，请参见上面的“语法”部分。

trans-unit.target: manage.rb文件是Chef管理控制台使用的默认配置文件。每次运行 chef-manage-ctl reconfigure 时，都会应用这些设置。

trans-unit.source: The maximum accepted body size for a client request, as indicated by the Content-Length request header. When the maximum accepted body size is greater than this value, a 413 Request Entity Too Large error is returned. Default value: 250m.
trans-unit.target: 客户请求接受的最大正文大小，如 Content-Length 请求标头所示。当最大接受的正文大小大于此值时，将返回 413 Request Entity Too Large 错误。默认值： 250m 。

trans-unit.source: The maximum amount (in megabytes) between checkpoints in log file segments. Default value: 3.
trans-unit.target: 日志文件段中检查点之间的最大数量（以兆字节为单位）。默认值： 3 。

trans-unit.source: The maximum amount of memory (in bytes). Default value: '8m'.
trans-unit.target: 最大内存量（以字节为单位）。默认值： '8m' 。

trans-unit.source: The maximum amount of shared memory. Default value: 17179869184.
trans-unit.target: 最大共享内存量。默认值： 17179869184 。

trans-unit.source: The maximum amount of time (in seconds) available to the chef-client run when the chef-client is run as a service on the Microsoft Windows platform. If the chef-client run does not complete within the specified timeframe, the chef-client run is terminated. Default value: 2 * (60 * 60).
trans-unit.target: 当厨师客户端作为服务在Microsoft Windows平台上运行时，厨师客户端可运行的最大时间（以秒为单位）。如果厨师客户端运行未在指定的时间内完成，则厨师客户端运行将终止。默认值： 2 * (60 * 60) 。

trans-unit.source: The maximum connection duration (in seconds) for the HTTP connection pool that is used by the rabbitmq-management plugin. Default value: 70.
trans-unit.target: rabbitmq-management插件使用的HTTP连接池的最大连接持续时间（以秒为单位）。默认值： 70 。

trans-unit.source: The maximum connection worker age (in seconds) for the HTTP connection pool that is used by the rabbitmq-management plugin. Default value: 70.
trans-unit.target: rabbitmq-management插件使用的HTTP连接池的最大连接工作年龄（以秒为单位）。默认值： 70 。

trans-unit.source: The maximum cull interval (in seconds) for the HTTP connection pool that is used by the rabbitmq-management plugin. Default value: 60.
trans-unit.target: rabbitmq-management插件使用的HTTP连接池的最大清除间隔（以秒为单位）。默认值： 60 。

trans-unit.source: The maximum field length (in number of tokens/terms). If a field length exceeds this value, Apache Solr may not be able to complete building the index. Default value: 100000 (increased from the Apache Solr default value of 10000).
trans-unit.target: 最大字段长度（以令牌/术语数为单位）。如果字段长度超过此值，则Apache Solr可能无法完成索引的构建。缺省值： 100000 （从Apache Solr缺省值 10000 增加）。

trans-unit.source: The maximum field length setting for Apache Solr should be greater than any expected node object file sizes in order for them to be successfully added to the search index. If a node object file is greater than the maximum field length, the node object will be indexed up to the maximum, but the part of the file past that limit will not be indexed. If this occurs, it will seem as if nodes disappear from the search index. To ensure that large node file sizes are indexed properly, verify the following configuration settings:
trans-unit.target: Apache Solr的最大字段长度设置应该大于任何预期的节点对象文件大小,以便它们能成功地添加到搜索索引中。如果一个节点对象文件大于最大字段长度,节点对象将被索引到最大限度,但超过该限度的部分文件将不会被索引。如果出现这种情况,就会出现节点从搜索索引中消失的情况。为了确保正确索引大节点文件大小,请验证以下配置设置。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of allowed concurrent connections. Default value: 350.
trans-unit.target: 允许的最大并发连接数。预设值： 350 。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of allowed concurrent connections. This value should only be tuned when the opscode_erchef['db_pool_size'] value used by the opscode-erchef service is modified. Default value: 350.
trans-unit.target: 允许的最大并发连接数。仅当修改opscode-erchef服务使用的 opscode_erchef['db_pool_size'] 值时，才应调整此值。预设值： 350 。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of arguments per command line. Default: nil.
trans-unit.target: 每个命令行的最大参数数。默认值： nil 。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of document updates that can be stored in memory before being flushed and added to the current index segment. Default value: 15.
trans-unit.target: 在刷新并添加到当前索引段之前可以在内存中存储的文档更新的最大数量。默认值： 15 。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of documents before a soft commit is triggered. Default value: 1000.
trans-unit.target: 触发软提交之前的最大文档数。预设值： 1000 。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of index segments allowed before they are merged into a single index. Default value: 2147483647.
trans-unit.target: 合并到单个索引中之前允许的最大索引段数。默认值： 2147483647 。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of keepalive proves that should be sent before dropping a connection. Default value: 2.
trans-unit.target: 在断开连接之前应发送的最大保活证明数量。默认值： 2 。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of messages that can be queued before RabbitMQ automatically drops messages from the front of the queue to make room for new messages. Default value: 10000.
trans-unit.target: RabbitMQ在自动从队列的最前面丢弃消息以为新消息腾出空间之前可以排队的最大消息数。预设值： 10000 。

trans-unit.target: 并发客户端的最大数量。与 nginx['worker_processes'] 一起使用，以确定允许的最大客户端数。默认值： 10240 。

trans-unit.source: The maximum size (in characters) for a command line. Default: nil.
trans-unit.target: 命令行的最大大小（以字符为单位）。默认值： nil 。

trans-unit.source: The maximum transmission unit (MTU) for the network interface.

trans-unit.source: The most common ways to interact with the Chef server using the Chef server API abstract the API from the user. That said, the Chef server API can be interacted with directly. The following sections describe a few of the ways that are available for doing that.
trans-unit.target: 使用Chef服务器API与Chef服务器交互的最常见方式是将API从用户中抽象出来。也就是说,可以直接与Chef服务器API进行交互。下面的章节描述了几种可以这样做的方式。

trans-unit.source: The mounted filesystem on the primary backend server is ext4
trans-unit.target: 主后端服务器上已挂载的文件系统是 ext4

trans-unit.source: The name (or IP address) of the LDAP server. The hostname of the LDAP or Active Directory server. Be sure the Chef server is able to resolve any host names. Default value: ldap-server-host.
trans-unit.target: LDAP服务器的名称（或IP地址）。LDAP或Active Directory服务器的主机名。确保Chef服务器能够解析任何主机名。缺省值： ldap-server-host 。

trans-unit.source: The name must begin with a lower-case letter or digit, may only contain lower-case letters, digits, hyphens, and underscores, and must be between 1 and 255 characters. For example: 4thcoffee.
trans-unit.target: 名称必须以小写字母或数字开头，只能包含小写字母，数字，连字符和下划线，并且必须在1到255个字符之间。例如： 4thcoffee 。

trans-unit.source: The name must begin with a lower-case letter or digit, may only contain lower-case letters, digits, hyphens, and underscores, and must be between 1 and 255 characters. For example: chef
trans-unit.target: 名称必须以小写字母或数字开头，只能包含小写字母，数字，连字符和下划线，并且必须在1到255个字符之间。例如： chef

trans-unit.source: The name must begin with a lower-case letter or digit, may only contain lower-case letters, digits, hyphens, and underscores, and must be between 1 and 255 characters. For example: chef.
trans-unit.target: 名称必须以小写字母或数字开头，只能包含小写字母，数字，连字符和下划线，并且必须在1到255个字符之间。例如： chef 。

trans-unit.source: The name of a file that is associated with a cookbook.
trans-unit.target: 与烹饪书相关联的文件名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of a file to be used with the PUT or a POST request.
trans-unit.target: 与 PUT 或 POST 请求一起使用的文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of a node can be obtained from the node_name attribute in the client.rb file or by allowing Ohai to collect this data during the chef-client run. When Ohai collects this data during the chef-client run, it uses the FQDN name of the node (which is always unique within an organization) as the name of the node.
trans-unit.target: 可以从client.rb文件中的 node_name 属性获得节点的名称，或者通过允许Ohai在Chef-client运行期间收集此数据来获得。当Ohai在chef-client运行期间收集此数据时，它将使用节点的FQDN名称（在组织内始终是唯一的）作为节点名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of a node is required as part of the authentication process to the Chef server. The name of each node must be unique within an organization, but otherwise can be any string that matches the following regular expression:
trans-unit.target: 节点的名称是需要作为Chef服务器认证过程的一部分。每个节点的名称必须在一个组织内是唯一的,但也可以是符合以下正则表达式的任何字符串。

trans-unit.source: The name of a policy group that exists on the Chef server.
trans-unit.target: 存在于 Chef 服务器上的策略组的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of a policy group that exists on the Chef server. policy_group must also be specified.
trans-unit.target: Chef服务器上存在的策略组的名称。还必须指定 policy_group 。

trans-unit.source: The name of a policy, as identified by the name setting in a Policyfile.rb file.
trans-unit.target: 策略的 name ，由Policyfile.rb文件中的名称设置标识。

trans-unit.source: The name of a policy, as identified by the name setting in a Policyfile.rb file. policy_name must also be specified.
trans-unit.target: 策略的 name ，由Policyfile.rb文件中的名称设置标识。还必须指定 policy_name 。

trans-unit.source: The name of a specific item within a data bag.
trans-unit.target: 数据袋中特定项目的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of a valid Windows PowerShell cmdlet. The name may only contain letter (a-z, A-Z), number (0-9), and underscore (_) characters and should start with a letter. The name may not be null or empty. This property may not be used in the same recipe as the code property.
trans-unit.target: 有效的Windows PowerShell cmdlet的名称。该名称只能包含字母（az，AZ），数字（0-9）和下划线（_）字符，并且应以字母开头。名称不能为null或为空。不能在与 code 属性相同的配方中使用此属性。

trans-unit.source: The name of the API client whose private key will be used to create the authorization header.
trans-unit.target: API客户端的名称,其私钥将用于创建授权头。

trans-unit.source: The name of the Amazon Simple Storage Service (S3) bucket. (This is configurable and may be pointed at external storage locations, such as Amazon EC2. Four settings require configuration when pointing at an external cookbook storage location: bookshelf['vip'], for the endpoint used by the chef-client; bookshelf['external_url'], for the endpoint used by the Chef server; bookshelf['access_key_id'], for user access key; bookshelf['secret_access_key'], for secret key; and opscode_erchef['s3_bucket'], for the bucket name. Reconfigure the Chef server after changing these settings. Default value: bookshelf.
trans-unit.target: Amazon Simple Storage Service（S3）存储桶的名称。 （这是可配置的，并且可以指向外部存储位置，例如Amazon EC2。指向外部食谱存储位置时，需要进行四个设置配置： bookshelf['vip'] ，用于厨师客户端使用的端点； bookshelf['external_url'] （用于Chef服务器使用的终结点）； bookshelf['access_key_id'] （用于用户访问密钥）； bookshelf['secret_access_key'] （用于密钥）；以及 opscode_erchef['s3_bucket'] （用于存储桶名称）。更改这些设置后，请重新配置Chef服务器，默认值： bookshelf 。

trans-unit.source: The name of the Chef server organization. The name must begin with a lower-case letter or digit, may only contain lower-case letters, digits, hyphens, and underscores, and must be between 1 and 255 characters. For example: chef. If this option is not specified, the upgrade command will prompt for it.
trans-unit.target: Chef服务器组织的名称。名称必须以小写字母或数字开头，只能包含小写字母，数字，连字符和下划线，并且必须在1到255个字符之间。例如： chef 。如果未指定此选项，则 upgrade 命令将提示输入。

trans-unit.source: The name of the DSC resource. This value is case-insensitive and must be a symbol that matches the name of the DSC resource.
trans-unit.target: DSC资源的名称。该值不区分大小写,必须是与DSC资源名称相符的符号。

trans-unit.source: The name of the Homebrew owner to be used by the chef-client when executing a command.

trans-unit.target: Nginx stub_status 端点的名称，用于访问Nginx stub_status 模块生成的数据。默认值： "/nginx_status" 。

trans-unit.source: The name of the RAID device. Default value: the name of the resource block See “Syntax” section above for more information.
trans-unit.target: RAID设备的名称。默认值：资源块的 name 。有关更多信息，请参见上面的“语法”部分。

trans-unit.source: The name of the Ruby block. Default value: the name of the resource block See “Syntax” section above for more information.
trans-unit.target: Ruby块的名称。默认值：资源块的 name 。有关更多信息，请参见上面的“语法”部分。

trans-unit.source: The name of the VRRP synchronization group. Default value: 'PC_GROUP'.
trans-unit.target: VRRP同步组的名称。默认值： 'PC_GROUP' 。

trans-unit.source: The name of the VRRP synchronization instance. Default value: 'PC_VI'.
trans-unit.target: VRRP同步实例的名称。默认值： 'PC_VI' 。

trans-unit.source: The name of the admin client that is passed as part of a the command itself.
trans-unit.target: 作为命令本身的一部分传递的管理客户端的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the chef-validator key that is used by the chef-client to access the Chef server during the initial chef-client run.

trans-unit.source: The name of the copyright holder. This option places a copyright notice that contains the name of the copyright holder in each of the pre-created files. If this option is not specified, a copyright name of “COMPANY_NAME” is used instead; it can easily be modified later.
trans-unit.target: 版权持有者的姓名。该选项在每个预先创建的文件中放置一个版权声明，其中包含版权持有者的名称。如果未指定此选项，则使用“ COMPANY_NAME”的版权名称；以后可以轻松对其进行修改。

trans-unit.source: The name of the file in COOKBOOK_NAME/files/default or the path to a file located in COOKBOOK_NAME/files. The path must include the file name and its extension. Can be used to distribute specific files to specific platforms. See “File Specificity” below for more information. See “Syntax” section above for more information.
trans-unit.target: 位于 COOKBOOK_NAME/files/default 中的文件名或位于 COOKBOOK_NAME/files 中的文件的路径。该路径必须包含文件名及其扩展名。可用于将特定文件分发到特定平台。有关更多信息，请参见下面的“文件特异性”。有关更多信息，请参见上面的“语法”部分。

trans-unit.source: The name of the node. Determines which configuration should be applied and sets the client_name, which is the name used when authenticating to a Chef server. The default value is the FQDN of the chef-client, as detected by Ohai. In general, Chef recommends that you leave this setting blank and let Ohai assign the FQDN of the node as the node_name during each chef-client run.
trans-unit.target: 节点的名称。确定应应用哪种配置并设置 client_name ，这是在对Chef服务器进行身份验证时使用的名称。默认值是Ohai检测到的Chef客户端的FQDN。通常，Chef建议您将此设置留空，并让Ohai 在每次Chef-client运行期间将节点的FQDN分配为 node_name 。

trans-unit.target: 节点的名称。这可能是一个有权限认证到Chef服务器的用户名,也可能是运行刀的机器的名称。例如:

trans-unit.target: 管理对Chef服务器的请求的特权用户的名称。默认值： 'pivotal' 。

trans-unit.source: The name of the public key.

trans-unit.target: 源代码管理管理提供程序的名称。默认值： Chef::Provider::Git 。可选值： Chef::Provider::Subversion 。

trans-unit.target: 子目录的名称，其中保留了应用程序源的原始副本。默认值： cached-copy 。

trans-unit.source: The name of the user and/or chef-client which made the request (pivotal)
trans-unit.target: 发出请求的用户和/或厨师客户的名称（ pivotal ）

trans-unit.target: 用户名。默认值：资源块的 name 。有关更多信息，请参见上面的“语法”部分。

trans-unit.source: The naming of folders within cookbook directories must literally match the host notation used for file specificity matching. For example, if a host is named foo.example.com, the folder must be named host-foo.example.com.
trans-unit.target: 食谱目录中文件夹的命名必须从字面上匹配用于文件特异性匹配的主机符号。例如，如果主机名为 foo.example.com ，则文件夹必须命名为 host-foo.example.com 。

trans-unit.source: The naming of folders within cookbook directories must literally match the host notation used for template specificity matching. For example, if a host is named foo.example.com, then the folder must be named host-foo.example.com.
trans-unit.target: 食谱目录中文件夹的命名必须从字面上匹配用于模板特异性匹配的主机符号。例如，如果主机名为 foo.example.com ，则该文件夹必须名为 host-foo.example.com 。

trans-unit.target: 申请路由的网络接口。

trans-unit.target: 该节点是一个分布式Erlang节点。默认值： false 。

trans-unit.source: The number of Ruby processes for which cookbook dependency problems are unsolved. Use the pgrep -fl depselector command to verify the number of depsolver workers that are running. If you are seeing 503 service unavailable errors, increase this value. Default value: '5'.
trans-unit.target: 未解决食谱依赖关系问题的Ruby进程数。使用 pgrep -fl depselector 命令来验证正在运行的depsolver worker的数量。如果看到503服务不可用错误，请增加此值。默认值： '5' 。

trans-unit.source: The number of allowed concurrent connections.
trans-unit.target: 允许的并发连接数。

trans-unit.source: The number of allowed concurrent connections. Default: 10.
trans-unit.target: 允许的并发连接数。默认值： 10 。

trans-unit.source: The number of allowed worker processes. Default value: 2.
trans-unit.target: 允许的工作进程数。默认值： 2 。

trans-unit.source: The number of allowed worker processes. Default value: node['cpu.total'].to_i.
trans-unit.target: 允许的工作进程数。默认值： node['cpu.total'].to_i 。

trans-unit.source: The number of allowed worker processes. The opscode-expander service runs on the back-end and feeds data to the opscode-solr service, which creates and maintains search data used by the Chef server. Additional memory may be required by these worker processes depending on the frequency and volume of chef-client runs across the organization, but only if the back-end machines have available CPU and RAM. Default value: 2.
trans-unit.target: 允许的工作进程数。该Opscode公司膨胀的后端和饲料数据到服务运行Opscode公司，Solr的服务，创建和维护由厨师服务器使用的搜索数据。这些工作进程可能需要额外的内存，具体取决于整个组织中厨师客户端运行的频率和数量，但前提是后端计算机具有可用的CPU和RAM。默认值： 2 。

trans-unit.source: The number of allowed worker processes. This value should be increased if requests made to the opscode-account service are timing out, but only if the front-end machines have available CPU and RAM. Default value: 4.
trans-unit.target: 允许的工作进程数。如果对opscode-account服务的请求超时，则应增加该值，但前提是前端计算机具有可用的CPU和RAM。默认值： 4 。

trans-unit.source: The number of allowed worker processes. Use with nginx['worker_connections'] to determine the maximum number of allowed clients. Default value: node['cpu']['total'].to_i.
trans-unit.target: 允许的工作进程数。与 nginx['worker_connections'] 一起使用，以确定允许的最大客户端数。默认值： node['cpu']['total'].to_i 。

trans-unit.source: The number of backup copies to keep for files in the directory. Default value: 5.
trans-unit.target: 目录中要保留文件的备份副本数。默认值： 5 。

trans-unit.source: The number of backups to be kept in /var/chef/backup (for UNIX- and Linux-based platforms) or C:/chef/backup (for the Microsoft Windows platform). Set to false to prevent backups from being kept. Default value: 5.
trans-unit.target: 要保存在 /var/chef/backup （对于基于UNIX和Linux的平台）或 C:/chef/backup （对于Microsoft Windows平台）中的备份数。设置为 false 以防止保留备份。默认值： 5 。

trans-unit.source: The number of backups to be kept in /var/chef/backup. Set to false to prevent backups from being kept.
trans-unit.target: 要保存在 /var/chef/backup 中的备份数。设置为 false 以防止保留备份。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes in the HTTP response body.
trans-unit.target: HTTP响应体的字节数。

trans-unit.source: The number of cookbook versions to include in the response, where n is the number of cookbook versions. For example: num_versions=3 returns the three latest versions, in descending order (newest to oldest). Use num_versions=all to return all cookbook versions. If num_versions is not specified, a single cookbook version is returned. 0 is an invalid input (an empty array for the versions of each cookbook is returned).
trans-unit.target: 响应中包含的食谱版本数，其中 n 是食谱版本数。例如： num_versions=3 以降序（最新到最旧）返回三个最新版本。使用 num_versions=all 返回所有食谱版本。如果未指定 num_versions ，则返回单个食谱版本。 0 为无效输入（返回每个食谱版本的空数组）。

trans-unit.source: The number of cookbooks per organization, across all versions, on the Chef server is under 500. (Multiple organizations with fewer than 500 cookbooks each, that still add up to a total of more than 500 cookbooks server-wide, is fine.)

trans-unit.source: The number of databases. Default value: '16'.

trans-unit.source: The number of helper threads available for parallel cookbook synchronization. Increasing this value may increase the frequency of gateway errors from the Chef server (503 and 504 errors). Decreasing this number reduces the frequency of gateway errors, if present. Default value: 10.
trans-unit.target: 可用于并行食谱同步的帮助程序线程数。增大此值可能会增加来自Chef服务器的网关错误的频率（503和504错误）。减少此数字可减少网关错误（如果存在）的频率。默认值： 10 。

trans-unit.source: The number of open connections to PostgreSQL that are maintained by the service. Default value: '20'.

trans-unit.source: The number of open connections to PostgreSQL that are maintained by the service. Default value: '5'.

trans-unit.source: The number of open connections to PostgreSQL that are maintained by the service. Default value: 20.

If failures persist, then increase this value (in small increments) and also increase the value for postgresql['max_connections']. Default value: 20.

trans-unit.source: The number of open connections to PostgreSQL that are maintained by the service. This value should be tuned in conjunction with the postgresql['max_connections'] setting for PostgreSQL. Default value: 20.

trans-unit.source: The omnibus installer is used to set up the Chef development kit on a workstation, including the chef-client itself, an embedded version of Ruby, RubyGems, OpenSSL, key-value stores, parsers, libraries, command line utilities, and community tools such as Kitchen, Berkshelf, and ChefSpec. The omnibus installer puts everything into a unique directory (opt/chefdk/) so that these components will not interfere with other applications that may be running on the target machine. Once installed, the chef-client requires a few more configuration steps before it can be run as a workstation.
trans-unit.target: 多功能安装程序用于在工作站上设置Chef开发套件，包括Chef客户端本身，Ruby的嵌入式版本，RubyGems，OpenSSL，键值存储，解析器，库，命令行实用程序以及社区工具，例如如Kitchen，Berkshelf和ChefSpec。 opt/chefdk/ 安装程序会将所有内容放入唯一目录（opt / chefdk /），以便这些组件不会干扰目标计算机上可能正在运行的其他应用程序。安装后，chef-client需要更多一些配置步骤才能作为工作站运行。

trans-unit.source: The omnibus installer puts everything into a unique directory (/opt/chef/) so that the chef-client will not interfere with other applications that may be running on the target machine. Once installed, the chef-client requires a few more configuration steps before it can perform its first chef-client run on a node.
trans-unit.target: omn​​ibus安装程序将所有内容放入一个唯一的目录（ /opt/chef/ ）中，以便厨师客户端不会干扰目标计算机上可能正在运行的其他应用程序。安装后，chef-client需要执行一些其他配置步骤，才能在节点上执行其第一个Chef-client运行。

trans-unit.source: The omnibus installer requires that an installation be done as a root user.
trans-unit.target: omnibus安装程序要求以root用户身份进行安装。

trans-unit.source: The omnibus installer will detect the version of the operating system, and then install the appropriate version of the chef-client using a single command to install the chef-client and all of its dependencies, including an embedded version of Ruby, RubyGems, OpenSSL, key-value stores, parsers, libraries, and command line utilities.
trans-unit.target: omnibus安装程序将检测操作系统的版本,然后使用一条命令安装适当版本的chef-client及其所有的依赖项,包括嵌入式Ruby、RubyGems、OpenSSL、键值存储、解析器、库和命令行实用程序。

trans-unit.source: The omnibus installer will search the PATH for a gem command rather than defaulting to the current gem environment. As part of enforce_path_sanity, the bin directories area added to the PATH, which means when there are no other proceeding RubyGems, the installation will still be operated against it.
trans-unit.target: 多功能安装程序将在 PATH 中搜索gem命令，而不是默认使用当前的gem环境。作为 enforce_path_sanity 一部分，将 bin 目录区域添加到 PATH ，这意味着当没有其他进行中的RubyGems时，仍将对其进行安装。

trans-unit.source: The only environment being altered is the one being passed to the child process that is started by the bash resource. This will not affect the environment of the chef-client or any child processes.
trans-unit.target: 唯一更改的环境是传递给bash资源启动的子进程的环境。这不会影响厨师客户或任何子进程的环境。

trans-unit.source: The opscode-expander-ctl executable can be used to generate status information for the opscode-expander service. The opscode-expander-ctl executable is run as a command-line tool from the master backend machine.
trans-unit.target: opscode-expander-ctl可执行文件可用于生成opscode-expander服务的状态信息。opscode-expander-ctl可执行文件在主后端计算机上作为命令行工具运行。

trans-unit.source: The order in which search results are to be sorted.
trans-unit.target: 搜索结果的排序顺序。

trans-unit.target: 其他属性优先级不受影响。

When the system process limits are too low, the chef-client will not be able to create threads. To increase the system process limits:

trans-unit.source: The path to the init script that is associated with the service. This is typically /etc/init.d/SERVICE_NAME. The init_command property can be used to prevent the need to specify overrides for the start_command, stop_command, and restart_command attributes. Default value: nil.
trans-unit.target: 与服务关联的初始化脚本的路径。通常是 /etc/init.d/SERVICE_NAME 。该 init_command 属性可以用来防止需要指定覆盖 start_command ， stop_command 和 restart_command 属性。默认值： nil 。

trans-unit.source: The path to the init script that is associated with the service. Use init_command to prevent the need to specify overrides for the start_command, stop_command, and restart_command properties. When this property is not specified, the chef-client will use the default init command for the service provider being used.
trans-unit.target: 与服务关联的初始化脚本的路径。使用 init_command 以防止需要指定覆盖 start_command ， stop_command 和 restart_command 性能。未指定此属性时，chef-client将为使用的服务提供商使用默认的init命令。

trans-unit.source: The path to the launchd property list.
trans-unit.target: Launchd属性列表的路径。

trans-unit.source: The path to the location in which a registry key is to be created or from which a registry key is to be deleted. Default value: the name of the resource block See “Syntax” section above for more information. The path must include the registry hive, which can be specified either as its full name or as the 3- or 4-letter abbreviation. For example, both HKLM\SECURITY and HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SECURITY are both valid and equivalent. The following hives are valid: HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE, HKLM, HKEY_CURRENT_CONFIG, HKCC, HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT, HKCR, HKEY_USERS, HKU, HKEY_CURRENT_USER, and HKCU.
trans-unit.target: 要在其中创建注册表项或从中删除注册表项的位置的路径。默认值：资源块的 name 。有关更多信息，请参见上面的“语法”部分。该路径必须包含注册表配置单元，可以将其指定为全名或3或4个字母的缩写。例如， HKLM\SECURITY 和 HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SECURITY 均有效且等效。以下配置单元是有效的： HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE ， HKLM ， HKEY_CURRENT_CONFIG ， HKCC ， HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT ， HKCR ， HKEY_USERS ， HKU ， HKEY_CURRENT_USER 和 HKCU 。

trans-unit.source: The policy applied when the maximum amount of memory is reached. Possible values: allkeys-lru (remove keys, starting with those used least frequently), allkeys-random (remove keys randomly), noeviction (don’t expire, return an error on write operation), volatile-lru (remove expired keys, starting with those used least frequently), volatile-random (remove expired keys randomly), and volatile-ttl (remove keys, starting with nearest expired time). Default value: 'noeviction'.
trans-unit.target: 达到最大内存量时应用的策略。可能的值： allkeys-lru （删除密钥，从最不频繁使用的密钥开始）， allkeys-random （随机删除密钥）， noeviction （不过期，在写操作中返回错误）， volatile-lru （删除过期的密钥，从使用最少的那些开始）， volatile-random （随机删除过期的密钥）和 volatile-ttl （删除密钥，从最近的过期时间开始）。默认值： 'noeviction' 。
